Posts.Content: Sep 9, 2012 10:17AM losing_sleep wrote: Olisa, I know this is hard,  Try to not let your mind go and think of all the bad things.  Wait for all the tests to come in so you know exactly what is going on.  Once all the tests are in then your Dad will know what direction to go in.  The waiting sucks but please try NOT to think the worse.
Posts.Title: Hi everybody! Olisa12 Olisa12

Posts.Content: Sep 17, 2012 07:02PM - edited Sep 17, 2012 07:05PM by losing_sleep Just had it done last Wednesday.  It took like 20 minutes.  It is doable.  I didn't like it but I just told myself lets just get this over with.  It did start to hurt, it took three tries to line it up so I told her I needed more numbing stuff and she was happy to give me more, so if you hurt be sure to tell them.  The surgery was a breeze, I was so afraid to be put to sleep, but it was fine.
Posts.Title: Wire Localization Planned Before Lumpectomy NSJ2 losing_sleep
